text: hi my name is Rebecca and in today's
lesson we're going to learn how to ask
and answer questions related to when you
were born
all right not that you're asked this
question every day but if you are then
at least you'll be prepared to know how
to answer it all right so this is what
you can say but before we did to the
answer let's stop for a minute and ask
the question what is the question the
question could be where were you are
where were you born right the mistake
that students make at times is to say
where you born
all right you can't use it like that
because the verb is is to be born right
so you have to say I was born you were
born he was born she was born they were
born we were born and so on okay so the
question again where were you born
right the answer to that might be I was
born right again not I born but I was
born in Kabul right in Afghanistan so
when you say the city you will use the
preposition in and very important again
to use the verb to be before you just or
right I was born in Kabul I was born in
Tokyo when you give the name of the city
you use the preposition in all right if
you're giving the name of the country
you could say I was born in China or I
was born in India right that's when
you're discussing the place when we're
talking about the time it's very
unlikely and that people are going to
ask you and what time you were born but
if it should ever happen then you will
be prepared right so you could say I was
born at 5:30 in the morning again with a
precise time we use the preposition acts
I was born on September 25th if you're
talking about one day or one date then
we use the preposition on I was born on
September 25th or if you are giving just
the year right then you would say I was
born in 1975 for example right if you
were giving the complete date you would
say something like this I was born on
September 25th 1975 okay
so again to review the questions where
were you born or when were you born
right answers I was born in Tokyo on
September 25th I was born in India in
1975 and so on all right
so if you'd like to do a little quiz on
this lesson which is always helpful even
when we think that we understand
something it's always really nice to do
a little review just to make sure and
you can do this quiz by going to our
website wwlp.com that's all for now talk
to you later bye for now
